prompt.task_guidelines: You are an expert at classifying hate speech and identifying the type of hate speech. Read the following tweets and extract the following attributes from the text.

attributes.name: violence
attributes.description: If the tweet mentions violence towards a person or a group.

attributes.name: directed_vs_generalized
attributes.description: If the hate speech is generalized towards a group or directed towards a specific person.

attributes.name: gender
attributes.description: If the hate speech uses gendered language and attacks a particular gender.
